[docs]class NetWorkException(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class SystemMaintenanceError(Exception):

[docs]class UserCredentialError(Exception):

[docs]class SeatReservationException(Exception):

    TIME_SPAN_ERROR = 0
    HAVE_RESERVED = 1
    FAILED_RESERVED = 2
    NO_AVAILABLE_RESERVATIONS = 3
    IP_NOT_ALLOWED = 4

    def __init__(self,message,type = TIME_SPAN_ERROR):
        self.type = type
        self.message = message
        super().__init__(message)
    
    def __eq__(self,type):
        return self.type == type
    
    def getType(self):
        return self.type
    def __str__(self):
        return "SeatServationExcetion: {0}, {1}".format(self.message,self.type)
